polito.sdp2017.DesignEnvironmentGui

Class ApplicationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • polito.sdp2017.DesignEnvironmentGui.ApplicationModel

  • public class ApplicationModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A Model class for the application, provides all the functionalities the View and the Controllers need for accessing the data managed by the application logic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApplicationModel()
      constructor for the application model, simply instantiate some variables.

      • openDatabaseConnection

        public void openDatabaseConnection(java.lang.String dbPath)
                            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                   java.sql.SQLException
        Try to open a connection toward a database whose path is specified as parameter. If any exception is launched by the methods called it is simply passed to the calling function.
        Parameters:
        dbPath - : path of the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException

        public boolean isConnected()

      • insertIPByXml

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> insertIPByXml(java.lang.String xmlPath)
                                               throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                      javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                      java.io.IOException
        Insert a new IPs in the database, given the XML file specified as input. The application produces a list of logs string to be delivered to the calling function, for tracing if the method acted correctly. Any exception due to a wrong XML schema are passed to the calling function, while the exceptions caused by adding to the database an already existing IP are kept in the list of String.
        Parameters:
        xmlPath - : XML file path to be parsed for retrieving IPs
        Returns:
        a list of String as set of logs
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        java.io.IOException

      • removeIP

        public boolean removeIP(java.lang.String id,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        boolean isCore)
        Attempt to remove an IP from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - : identifier for the IP to be removed
        name - : name of the IP to be removed
        isCore - : a flag for signaling if the specified id refers to a Core or to a Manager
        Returns:
        a flag specifying if the IP was correctly removed

      • searchIPs

        public java.util.List<IP> searchIPs(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> pars)
        Search an IP in the database, given a set of parameter passed as list of String.
        Parameters:
        pars - : list of String containing the search parameter for building the SQL query
        Returns:
        a list containing all the IPs which matched the searching parameters
